class.name: OpenXRStructureBase
class.brief_description: Object for storing OpenXR structure data.
class.description: Object for storing OpenXR structure data that is passed when calling into OpenXR APIs.

method.name: get_structure_type
method.description: Returns the structure type (OpenXR [code]XrStructureType[/code]) used for this structure.

members.member: Setting another structure object here chains these structures together to extend the API functionality. Consult the OpenXR documentation for which structures can be used with a given API call.
